                              爆料
                          </p>
                          <span class="line"></span>
                          <p>
                              <span class="num">109100</span>
                              粉丝
                          </p>
                      </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="btn-group">
                                              <span class="reward-btn btn" onclick="sensors.track('DetailModelClick', {'business':'好价','model_name':'爆料人','sub_model_name':'底部','button_name':'打赏'})">打赏</span>

                      <i class="icon-plus-o-thin"></i>
                      关注</span>
                  </div>
              </div>
          </div>

    <div class="ads z-stuff-bar">

        <!-- 精彩 -->
        <div class="tab_info comment-main" id="commentTabBlockHot">
            <ul class="comment-main-list">
                <!-- .comment-main-list-item 为完整的一条一级评论 -->
                <!-- data-comment-id 评论id -->

                    <!-- 头像区域 -->
                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-avatar">
                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/8003592004/pinglun" target="_blank">
                            <!-- 用户头像 -->
                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-avatar-head" src="https://avatarimg.smzdm.com/default/8003592004/6760fb8ef652e7905-small.jpg" alt="">
                            <!-- 头像挂件 -->
                                                        <!-- V标识 -->
                                                    </a>
                    </div>

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>

                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_342142393" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                        <!-- 删除 --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 把踩评论按钮删除 -->

                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>感谢分享。</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->

                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->

                                <div class="content-info"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-info -->
                                    <span>17小时前</span>

                                        <span>山东</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 start -->

                                    <i class="icon-info-mark-o"></i>该评论被折叠

            <div class="mobile-input-container">
                <div class="mobile-input">
                    <input placeholder="手机号"/>
                </div>

                            <img src="https://res.smzdm.com/business/login/select-selected.png"/>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checkbox-info">
                            我已阅读并同意<span><a href="https://res.smzdm.com/protocol/user/20220119.html" target="_blank">《用户协议》</a><a href="https://res.smzdm.com/protocol/privacy/20220715.html" target="_blank">《“什么值得买”个人信息保护政策》》</a></span>       
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="mobile-submit">确定</div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div> -->
    <!-- comment_wrap end -->

<!-- 海淘 好价 百科 资讯 - 挂件 -->
<div class="side-detail-mix">
        <!-- column流标题 -->
      <div class="z-side-head z-clearfix">
          <div class="z-side-title">
              <div class="side-head-tab J_side_tab">
                                        <span class="active">海淘</span>
                                                          <span>好价</span>
                                                                      </div>
          </div>
      </div>
                <div class="J_hover_show show">
            <ul class="side-img-text">
                                          <li class="imgtext-item">
                <a class="imgtext-img" href="https://www.smzdm.com/p/143387770/" target="_blank" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210010','name':'海淘','pagetitle':'支付券汇总～京东领2.01-2元支付券！交通银行必中2-28元支付券！'})">
                  <img src="https://qny.smzdm.com/202503/14/67d401ab75cb69654.png_a100.jpg">
